SELECT IF(c.name = '', b.name, c.name) AS groupName, a.group_id AS groupId, c.session_id AS sessionId, c.avatar_url AS avatarUrl FROM base_im_group_ref_user a LEFT JOIN base_im_group b ON b.id = a.group_id LEFT JOIN base_im_session_ref_user c ON c.session_id = b.session_id AND c.user_id = a.user_id WHERE a.user_id = #{currentUserId} AND b.id IS NOT NULL
AND a.group_id = #{dto.groupId}
AND ( b.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dto.searchKey}, '%') OR c.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dto.searchKey}, '%') OR a.group_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dto.searchKey}, '%') )
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
